summary: REQ-11/12/13 are largely implemented in the frontend: ApologyLetterCard adds a new footer message and prominent button after the sign-off, and clicking opens an in-page dialog-based video player styled to match the romantic theme. One key gap is that the actual local static video asset is referenced but not shown as added in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: The video file is loaded from the frontend as a static asset (not fetched through the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: The code references a local video path (/assets/kiss.mp4), but the diff summary does not show the actual video file being added to the frontend static/public assets, so itâ€™s not verifiable that the asset exists in the repo/build output.
